power.description: The speed the player will be launched at.

pitch.description: The angle the player will be launched at on the Y axis.

yaw.description: The angle the player will be launched at on the X axis.

rotation_time.description: Time taken to swing around the pole.

time.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player.

Extra.name: A cylindrical volume that makes the character spin around a pole.
